A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Last Jedi will be my last Star Wars movie.  The \"Fresh\" film draws to light the unfortunate truth that this film was just too big to fail -too many people were due to make millions and could not afford for it to flop. This trend will continue.  It's unfortunate because the truly creative films out there will be overshadowed by the tide of Disney and their mediocre blockbusters. The force was not with this one.
